    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Golden Branding Iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1583)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a two-handed  firearm  or crossbow

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You hit a target with a ranged Strike with the affixed weapon

**Requirement** You're an expert with the affixed weapon.
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman is a gold-plated brand that can be affixed to a ranged weapon's stock. When you activate a golden branding iron, you mark the target with your magical sigil.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Limited"
>
Golden Branding Iron
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You harmlessly place your unique magical sigil, which is about 1 square inch in size, anywhere on the target creature, as long as the location is visible to you. The mark is only visible to you and up to 6 of your allies. The mark can be scrubbed or scraped off with 5 minutes of work. It fades naturally over the course of a month.

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your arcane sigil fades naturally over the course of a year.
